annonstext:
We are looking for a passionate and experienced Product Managers to join our product teams in Stockholm, Sweden.

As a Product Manager you will work closely with a team of motivated and experienced engineers, building and developing Spotify's features. Together we try to find new ways to create a great Spotify experience for all our users at all times. Above all, your work will impact the way the world experiences music

What You'll Do

	Work closely with skilled engineers and set the high-level mission, vision, and roadmap for the platform and the team.
	Own and drive the product strategy for the observability platform.
	Collaborate with key partners across the organisation to make sure that you collaboratively provide for the company’s short- and long-term goals.
	Ensure that your team is constantly doing the right things, and has a healthy balance of innovation, reducing technical debt and providing maintenance and support.

Who you are

	You have experience working with product development and building consumer products together with cross functional teams
	You have a technical understanding of what it takes to build and maintain large scale applications and services and you are comfortable facilitating and participating in the architectural and technical decisions made in the team
	You know how to inspire, motivate and support a team to get things done
	You can translate your and your team's knowledge and experience to user stories and prioritized backlog items
	You are good at communicating concepts and ideas to stakeholders at all levels, in different shapes depending on the context
	You know how to influence decision-making at all levels within an organization, and in a variety of contexts
	You have experience with dataYou have experience with data driven product development and knowledge of agile methodologies

You are welcome at Spotify for who you are, no matter where you come from, what you look like, or what’s playing in your headphones. Our platform is for everyone, and so is our workplace. The more voices we have represented and amplified in our business, the more we will all thrive, contribute, and be forward-thinking! So bring us your personal experience, your perspectives, and your background. It’s in our differences that we will find the power to keep revolutionizing the way the world listens.

Spotify transformed music listening forever when we launched in 2008. Our mission is to unlock the potential of human creativity by giving a million creative artists the opportunity to live off their art and billions of fans the chance to enjoy and be passionate about these creators. Everything we do is driven by our love for music and podcasting. Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service with a community of more than 320 million users.
annonstextFormaterad:
We are looking for a passionate and experienced Product Managers to join our product teams in Stockholm, Sweden.

As a Product Manager you will work closely with a team of motivated and experienced engineers, building and developing Spotify's features. Together we try to find new ways to create a great Spotify experience for all our users at all times. Above all, your work will impact the way the world experiences music

What You'll Do

  • Work closely with skilled engineers and set the high-level mission, vision, and roadmap for the platform and the team.
  • Own and drive the product strategy for the observability platform.
  • Collaborate with key partners across the organisation to make sure that you collaboratively provide for the company’s short- and long-term goals.
  • Ensure that your team is constantly doing the right things, and has a healthy balance of innovation, reducing technical debt and providing maintenance and support.

Who you are

  • You have experience working with product development and building consumer products together with cross functional teams
  • You have a technical understanding of what it takes to build and maintain large scale applications and services and you are comfortable facilitating and participating in the architectural and technical decisions made in the team
  • You know how to inspire, motivate and support a team to get things done
  • You can translate your and your team's knowledge and experience to user stories and prioritized backlog items
  • You are good at communicating concepts and ideas to stakeholders at all levels, in different shapes depending on the context
  • You know how to influence decision-making at all levels within an organization, and in a variety of contexts
  • You have experience with dataYou have experience with data driven product development and knowledge of agile methodologies

You are welcome at Spotify for who you are, no matter where you come from, what you look like, or what’s playing in your headphones. Our platform is for everyone, and so is our workplace. The more voices we have represented and amplified in our business, the more we will all thrive, contribute, and be forward-thinking! So bring us your personal experience, your perspectives, and your background. It’s in our differences that we will find the power to keep revolutionizing the way the world listens.

Spotify transformed music listening forever when we launched in 2008. Our mission is to unlock the potential of human creativity by giving a million creative artists the opportunity to live off their art and billions of fans the chance to enjoy and be passionate about these creators. Everything we do is driven by our love for music and podcasting. Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service with a community of more than 320 million users.
